verbs.description: [ARG0: The Oklahoman 's Justin Wingerter] [V: talked] [ARG2: to protesters angry over Donald Trump 's latest immigration policy to separate immigrant children from their parents] .
The Oklahoman 's Justin Wingerter talked to protesters angry over [ARG0: Donald Trump 's latest immigration policy] to [V: separate] [ARG1: immigrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] .
